pages.text: Shicked, that you only have 3 hearts?$(br2)This pack includes PlayerEx, a mod, that let's you level up yourself and become stronger.$(br2)You collect experience as normal and the heighest level your reach, plus some extra math, determines your PlayerEx level.
You can then spend your skill points!$(br2)Click on the scroll, in your inventory.$(br)There you can make yourself stronger!
